description: Yo, G, let's talk about keeping your Pokémon in top-notch shape with some natural remedies – we're talking about healing without the fancy potions, right from Mother Nature's toolkit!

First up, we got Berries – these bad boys are like the Pokémon world's superfoods. /e/Oran Berries/e/? They're the go-to for patching up your Pokémon after a tough battle. Just pop one in their mouth, and they'll be back in action.
Then there's /e/Medicinal Leeks/e/. Yeah, turns out it's not just for sunburns. Mix that gooey goodness with water, and you've got a natural potion to soothe your Pokémon's bumps and bruises.

And don't sleep on the healing power of the /e/Revival Herb/e/. It's like the ultimate pick-me-up for your fainted Pokémon. One sniff, and they'll be back on their feet, ready to throw down. Be sure to mix in some honey!
Keep your Pokémon thriving with these rad natural cures. Your team will thank you for it!
